analysis.description:
AMP.tokenPerETH should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0xaa6b36487f6a8680d05fa8ea46f075082baa80df.sol#60-61)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0xaa6b36487f6a8680d05fa8ea46f075082baa80df.sol#33)
